articles.content: Aaron Nesmith was at the Pacers' Summer League opener Friday as a fan rather than a player, still waiting for the trade that sent Malcolm Brogdon to the Celtics — in exchange for Nesmith, Malik Fitts… [+5437 chars]

articles.title: Chris Sale returns to mound for Boston Red Sox, takes 'step in the right direction' during 3-2 loss - ESPN
articles.description: Boston ace Chris Sale worked five scoreless innings in his season debut, but the Red Sox bullpen couldn't hold a two-run lead in a 3-2 loss to the Tampa Bay Rays on Tuesday night in St. Petersburg, Florida.
articles.content: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. -- Chris Sale worked five scoreless innings in his season debut, but the Boston Red Sox bullpen couldn't hold a two-run lead in a 3-2 loss to the Tampa Bay Rays on Tuesday night.… [+3136 chars]

articles.author: Zach Crizer
articles.title: MLB trade rumors feeling dull? We need a new way of thinking about the drama of baseball's deadline deals - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Baseball is a highly sophisticated industry in 2022. Is it making the trade deadline less entertaining?
articles.content: I have a friend who is a Texas Rangers fan. He doesnt nerd out on advanced stats or read prospect rankings or follow them religiously. He just checks the score and keeps tabs on whether they are good… [+12943 chars]
